How I started

About 5 years ago, my design projects became full-fledged brand identities for local Oklahoma businesses. As I learned about design systems and patterns, I was thrilled about how powerfully they be represented and leveraged on the web.

What I'm working on

My best work revolves around static sites, CSS animation, and front-end performance üèÜ. That's what you can expect to find in my projects.

What I'm doing now
